channel.title: ggplot on Statasaurus - R and Stats Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot on Statasaurus - R and Stats Blog

item.title: Expanding Dates for Groups with Differing Date Ranges
item.description: A common date transformation I need to do with dates is to convert the data from just a list of events to weekly numbers. To do this I need to expand the dates for each group.
